title: ʻO Marco Parrone
about_content: Aloha, ʻo wau ʻo Marco Parrone, ʻoluʻolu i koʻu ʻaoʻao home, ma aneʻi hiki iā ʻoe ke ʻike i kekahi mau polokalamu aʻu i hoʻomohala ai.
apps_content1: Hiki iā ʻoe ke hoʻāʻo pololei i nā polokalamu i ka polokalamu kele pūnaewele, a hiki iā ʻoe ke hoʻouka iā lākou mai loko pū kekahi
apps_content2: Inā loaʻa iā ʻoe a me Android kelepona, hiki iā ʻoe ke hoʻouka i nā polokalamu mai Google Play
notes: Nā memo: kahi polokalamu e mālama a hoʻonohonoho i nā memo.
bookmarks: Luna Manakō: kahi luna bookmark kūʻokoʻa i ka polokalamu kele pūnaewele.
reminder: Hoʻomanaʻo Looping: kahi polokalamu e hoʻouna i nā leka hoʻomaopopo i nā manawa i ho'ākāka ʻia o ka manawa.
tictactoe: Kālena Tic Tac: kahi pāʻani tic-tac-manamananui.
disclaimer_content3: E KĀLĀ ANA Kēia lawelawe i nā unuhi i mana ʻia e GOOGLE. Hōʻike ʻo GOOGLE i nā palapala āpau e pili ana i nā unuhi, hōʻike a i ʻole hoʻokō ʻia, e pili ana i kekahi mau hōʻoia o ka pololei, ka pili ʻana, a me nā ʻōlelo hoʻokō o ka pono, ka pono no kahi ʻāpana kūlike ʻole a me ka hana ʻole.
disclaimer_content4: Ua unuhi ʻia kēia pūnaewele no kāu pono e hoʻohana ana i nā polokalamu unuhi i mana ʻia e Google Translate. Ua hana ʻia nā hana kūpono e hoʻolako i kahi unuhi pololei, akā naʻe, ʻaʻole maikaʻi kahi unuhi automated a ʻaʻole hoʻi i manaʻo ʻia e pani i nā mea unuhi kanaka. Hāʻawi ʻia nā unuhi ma ke ʻano he lawelawe i nā mea hoʻohana o ka pūnaewele marcoparrone.com, a hāʻawi ʻia "e like me ia." ʻAʻohe palapala hoʻokō o kekahi ʻano, i hōʻike ʻia a i ʻole nā manaʻo paha, i hana ʻia e pili ana i ka pololei, ka hilinaʻi, a me ka pololei o nā unuhi i hana ʻia mai ka ʻōlelo Pelekania i kekahi ʻōlelo ʻē aʻe. ʻAʻole hiki ke unuhi pololei ʻia kekahi mau ʻike (e like me nā kiʻi, nā wikiō, Flash, a pēlā aku) ma muli o nā palena o ka polokalamu unuhi.
disclaimer_content5: ʻO ka ʻōlelo mana ka mana Pelekane o ka pūnaewele. ʻAʻole paʻa a ʻaʻohe ʻokoʻa nā mea i hana ʻia i ka unuhi a ʻaʻohe ona kū i ke kānāwai no ka hoʻokō a me nā kumu hoʻokō. Inā kū kekahi nīnau e pili ana i ka pololei o ka ʻike i loko o ka pūnaewele i unuhi ʻia, e nānā i ka mana Pelekane o ka pūnaewele ʻo ia ka mana mana.
